name: drawerId
description: The ID the drawer element gets.

name: toggle
description: The CSS selector for the element that toggles the bottom drawer.

name: closeOnClick
description: Whether the bottom drawer should close when a child element is clicked.

name: title
description: The title of the bottom drawer.

name: usePortal
description: Whether to use a portal for the bottom drawer. The portal can be used to render the bottom drawer outside of the current DOM hierarchy.

name: portalTarget
description: The target of the portal, when in use.

name: isNestedElement
description: Determines if the bottom drawer element is nested.

name: nestedParentRef
description: The parent `OcBottomDrawer` ref of the nested bottom drawer.
